Safari As you have enabled Download with Wi-Fi only, downloading will not occur since you are using your mobile network Add actions for robot, start from here After clicking “Confirm”robot will switch to progarmming mode, please lay robot at a steady place Adjust joints of robot, set up an action, click \"Add\" when setting up completely Continue setting up actions, click \"Add\" when setting up completely Have you mastered the simple programming tutorial? Create new actions now. Start immediately Initial action Add action Robot will switch to programming mode, please lay robot at a steady place. Switch successfully. Manipulate robot and \'add\' a frame of action here. Click \'end\' to quit. Add Finish Play Stop Play Considering the large motion range in the preview, you are advised to place the robot on an even surface to prevent falls. Reset Copy Action # has already copied Paste This action will be pasted over action #. Total Time:# Max: Min: Save Action Action Type: Action name (no more than 16 characters) Action description (no more than 100 characters) Tip: you can see the action in the action table after you save it. The action name cannot be blank The action introduction cannot be blank Action name already exists The current action is not saved. Do you wish to cancel it? Continue editing Quit Save action successfully Action# Power down complete,, Please give the robot set action. Click \"finish\" to stop adding Cut off successfully, place an action again, click “confirm” to replace Select different roles to play Soccer player Somersaulting, shooting, and guarding - I am good at everything Gladiator Unrmed combat to defeat the enemy Dancer Dance to the music Comming soon Add new roles Rotate your phone to play The remote controller is being initialized Failure to initialize, please try again Try again Mode selection Single robot mode Multiple robot mode Up Down Left Right Turn leftwards Turn rightwards Insufficient power for your robot, Please connect it to the charger The robot has lost connection, please reconnect it Give up this edition? Syncing has failed The robot is busy, Please try it later The file already exists No memory card is mounted This robot version does not support file transfers Unknown error Syncing files. Do not operate Re-synchronize Defence Celebrate Hit from left Hit from right Left hand hits forward Right hand hits forward Fall backward and rise Fall forward and rise Quick short steps adjustment Rush from the right Slide tackle with right foot Shoot with right foot Rush from the front Rush from left Slide tackle with left foot Shoot with left foot Prompt: Click#to modify preset actions Action order cannot be left blank Timer New timer In this page, you can create action by switching robot to programming mode. One action is consist of several frames. Make a posture of your robot and add frames into action. Repeat previous steps to complete the action. Disconnect Square Event details Join now List Me Not logged in Received messages Created actions Downloaded actions Favorite actions Personal information Action Demo Even more amazing actions from Alpha Large selection of robot roles Unlimited creativity waiting to be challenged Choose different roles for different actions Raise your hands and cheer with Alpha Sit down and listen to Alpha tell a story Spin left three times, spin right three times, come and exercise with Alpha Alpha\'s short lesson is starting La-la-la, la-la-la, Alpha can sing for you No login account Firmware upgraded. Waiting for the robot to restart and reconnect… Bluetooth upgraded. Waiting for the robot to restart and reconnect… Transmitting upgrade files… This time, we set out anew! The application has a whole new look. This time, we are up for any challenge. Look at my prehistoric power. No matter what the weather, Alpha, I will be here waiting for you. Master, I\'m over here!
Dubbing for actions Start dubbing Stop dubbing Restart dubbing Dubbing complete Dubbing Preview Volume Are you sure you want to discard this dub? Download successful. You can dub downloaded or created actions for Alpha! Try it now Here is the dubbing function Voices Download failure Disconnect robot Disconnected Saved Start the PC software to activate the firmware and play with Alpha Open Select the Alpha1 PC programming software. Download and install Now use the data cable to connect Alpha and your robot Place the robot on a level surface and connect the adapter to ensure sufficient power Finally, do not forget to restart the robot to complete the firmware activation If you have any problems, please call the Customer Service Hotline at 400-6666-700 Currently not logged in to Twitter, please login first Go to login Currently not logged in to Twitter, please go to "System-Settings" to login

The actions have downloaded to your device so you can continue the demo. Are you sure you want to delete actions? This will also delete the actions and audio files stored on the robot\'s memory card. Alpha is connecting to the Internet Alpha connection failed Alpha connection succeeded Sync network for connected robots Select WIFI Change WIFI Set up WIFI No networks available You can connect your WIFI in "Settings”>WIFI, then enter the password on "Alpha 1" You can also manually enter the WIFI name and password I got it Enhance robot functionality by connecting to the Internet Use custom commands to create your exclusive robot Auto-upgrade robot Robot software version Robot hardware version Robot IP address Network tips Must be connected to the Internet to do this Go to the Internet Upgrade tips Robot system version too low. Begin robot system upgrade Robot and mobile phone will be disconnected during upgrade Programming Challenges Courses Click here to adjust the corresponding robot part Click here to reset the robot Add basic actions to your creation here Add more complex actions to your creation here Add sounds and recordings to your creation here Please adjust the robot body part that you clicked After adjusting the action, click here to add to your creation Drag here to adjust the duration of the action Try adding some music Click here to add tags to the music Click here to return the pointer to its initial position Click here again to show more operations Preview Change Copy Cut Paste Delete Action # copied Action X cut Action X deleted Delete audio Audio deleted Please select the robot part you want to adjust the action for on your phone Auto-record action When auto mode is on, the robot\'s trajectory will be recorded in your creation (every 200ms). You can adjust the robot action by clicking "Start" After adjusting the action, click here to stop recording Start Preview action Basic actions Add Audio Record There is already audio in your creation. Replace with the current audio? Tips: New audio tags need to be added after replacing the audio Action not saved. Do you want to exit?
